${ModID}:Jinx.NAME: Jinx
${ModID}:Jinx.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! ${ModID}:Maledict{!Upgrades!|>0= to ALL enemies}.

${ModID}:Blast.NAME: Blast
${ModID}:Blast.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Retain. NL A random enemy loses !D! HP.{!${ModID}:m2!|>0= NL Apply !${ModID}:m2! Poison to them.} NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:RefinedBlast.NAME: Refined Blast
${ModID}:RefinedBlast.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Retain. NL A random enemy loses !D! HP.{!${ModID}:m2!|>0= NL Apply !${ModID}:m2! Poison to them.} NL Draw !M! card{!M!|>1=s}. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:ShadowFont.NAME: Shadow Font
${ModID}:ShadowFont.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Add a *Blast{!Upgrades!|>0=+} into your hand. NL Scry !M!.

${ModID}:SnareTrap.NAME: Snare Trap
${ModID}:SnareTrap.DESCRIPTION: {@@}${ModID}:Trap. NL Apply !M! Weak{!Upgrades!|>0= to ALL enemies}.

${ModID}:FirebombTrap.NAME: Firebomb Trap
${ModID}:FirebombTrap.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Trap. NL At the end of your next turn, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:Tripwire.NAME: Tripwire
${ModID}:Tripwire.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Trap. NL Gain !B! Block. NL ALL enemies lose !M! Strength this turn.

${ModID}:PressurePlate.NAME: Pressure Plate
${ModID}:PressurePlate.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Trap. NL Apply !M! *Mark. NL ALL enemies lose HP equal to their *Mark.

${ModID}:FlockOfBats.NAME: Flock of Bats
${ModID}:FlockOfBats.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Whenever you are attacked this turn, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:Bushwhack.NAME: Bushwhack
${ModID}:Bushwhack.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Gain !B! Block. NL Draw !M! card{!M!|>1=s}. NL Discard !M! card{!M!|>1=s}.

${ModID}:LineUp.NAME: Line Up
${ModID}:LineUp.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Next turn, gain {!M!|1=[E]|2=[E] [E]|3=[E] [E] [E]|@=!M! [E]} and ${ModID}:Trigger your next ${ModID}:Trap twice.

${ModID}:Submerge.NAME: Submerge
${ModID}:Submerge.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Add a *Void into your discard pile.

${ModID}:VilePowder.NAME: Vile Powder
${ModID}:VilePowder.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Apply !M! ${ModID}:Maledict to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:TheRumble.NAME: The Rumble
${ModID}:TheRumble.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL During Boss and Elite combats, repeat{!M!|>1= !M! times}.

${ModID}:BagAndTag.NAME: Bag and Tag
${ModID}:BagAndTag.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Trigger your next ${ModID}:Trap twice.

${ModID}:PlagueOfToads.NAME: Plague of Toads
${ModID}:PlagueOfToads.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy !M! times.

${ModID}:Blunderbuss.NAME: Blunderbuss
${ModID}:Blunderbuss.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal damage equal to the number of cards in your hand times !M!. Unplayable cards count as !${ModID}:m2! cards.{!Location!|0= NL (Deals !D! damage.)}

${ModID}:HeavyStick.NAME: Heavy Stick
${ModID}:HeavyStick.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL  Deals additional damage equal to !M! times your Mojo.

${ModID}:Blowpipe.NAME: Blowpipe
${ModID}:Blowpipe.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage. NL Put !M! random Unplayable card{!M!|>1=s} from your draw pile into your hand.

${ModID}:SneakierStrike.NAME: Sneakier Strike
${ModID}:SneakierStrike.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage. NL If you have Scried this turn, gain {!M!|1=[E]|2=[E] [E]|3=[E] [E] [E]|@=!M! [E]} and apply !${ModID}:m2! ${ModID}:Venom.

${ModID}:DarkRitual.NAME: Sinister Ritual
${ModID}:DarkRitual.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Regen. NL At the start of your turn, take !${ModID}:m2! damage.

${ModID}:SwarmOfBeetles.NAME: Swarm of Beetles
${ModID}:SwarmOfBeetles.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you gain Block, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:BadMedicine.NAME: Bad Medicine
${ModID}:BadMedicine.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you heal, a random enemy loses twice as much HP. NL Heal !M! HP.

${ModID}:RestlessSpirits.NAME: Restless Spirits
${ModID}:RestlessSpirits.DESCRIPTION: {@@}{!Upgrades!|>0=Innate. NL }At the start of your turn, add a *Blast into your hand.

${ModID}:Darkvision.NAME: Darkvision
${ModID}:Darkvision.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, Scry !M! and gain !M! Block for each card discarded this way.

${ModID}:Portents.NAME: Portents
${ModID}:Portents.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you discard a card via Scry, deal !M! damage to a random enemy.

${ModID}:IllIntendedSchemes.NAME: Ill Intended Schemes
${ModID}:IllIntendedSchemes.DESCRIPTION: Whenever a ${ModID}:Trap is triggered, gain !M! Block.

${ModID}:OthersiderForm.NAME: Othersider Form
${ModID}:OthersiderForm.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain !M! ${ModID}:Mojo and lose !${ModID}:m2! Strength.

${ModID}:SpiritualJourney.NAME: Spiritual Journey
${ModID}:SpiritualJourney.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Innate.{!Upgrades!|0= Ethereal.} NL At the end of combat, raise your Max HP by !M!. Playing an Attack reduces gain by 1.

${ModID}:TrapperMaster.NAME: Trapper Master
${ModID}:TrapperMaster.DESCRIPTION: {@@}{!Upgrades!|>0=Innate. NL }The first time a ${ModID}:Trap is triggered each turn, gain {!M!|1=[E]|2=[E] [E]|3=[E] [E] [E]|@=!M! [E]} and draw !M! card{!M!|>1=s}.

${ModID}:DeathWard.NAME: Death Ward
${ModID}:DeathWard.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, deal !${ModID}:m2! damage to a random enemy !M! times.

${ModID}:BriarPatch.NAME: Briar Patch
${ModID}:BriarPatch.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! ${ModID}:Spines. NL Whenever you are attacked, deal damage back equal to !${ModID}:m2!% of your total ${ModID}:Spines.

${ModID}:CampOut.NAME: Camp Out
${ModID}:CampOut.DESCRIPTION: Choose one: Gain !M! Regen, or Upgrade all cards in your hand at the start of your next !${ModID}:m2! turns. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Forge.NAME: Forge
${ModID}:Forge.DESCRIPTION: Upgrade all cards in your hand at the start of your next !M! turns.

${ModID}:BlendingIn.NAME: Blending In
${ModID}:BlendingIn.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, if any enemy intends to use a non-attack move, gain !M! ${ModID}:Blur.

${ModID}:SpinningBlades.NAME: Spinning Blades
${ModID}:SpinningBlades.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Trap. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:VengefulTotem.NAME: Vengeful Totem
${ModID}:VengefulTotem.DESCRIPTION: {@@}${ModID}:Trap. NL Deal 7 damage. NL Add a *Blast into your hand. NL During Boss and Elite combats, repeat{!M!|>1= !M! times}.

${ModID}:HexingTotem.NAME: Hexing Totem
${ModID}:HexingTotem.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Trap. NL Apply !M! ${ModID}:Maledict. NL Gain !${ModID}:m2! temporary ${ModID}:Mojo. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:WardingTotem.NAME: Warding Totem
${ModID}:WardingTotem.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Trap. NL Gain !${ModID}:m2! Artifact. NL Gain !M! *Plated *Armor. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:CageOfSerpents.NAME: Cage of Serpents
${ModID}:CageOfSerpents.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Trap. NL Apply !${ModID}:m2! ${ModID}:Venom. NL Deal !D! damage to a random enemy !M! times.

${ModID}:Minefield.NAME: Minefield
${ModID}:Minefield.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Trap. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Can be Upgraded any number of times.

${ModID}:WatchAndLearn.NAME: Watch and Learn
${ModID}:WatchAndLearn.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL ${ModID}:Trigger all traps in your hand.

${ModID}:AcidCloud.NAME: Acid Cloud
${ModID}:AcidCloud.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! ${ModID}:Venom to ALL enemies. NL ALL enemies lose !D! HP. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:BrambleShield.NAME: Bramble Shield
${ModID}:BrambleShield.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Gain Block equal to your ${ModID}:Spines + ${ModID}:Mojo + !M!.{!Location!|0= NL (Gains !B! Block.)}

${ModID}:EagleEyes.NAME: Eagle Eyes
${ModID}:EagleEyes.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Scry !M! for each enemy in combat.

${ModID}:BarbedLasso.NAME: Barbed Lasso
${ModID}:BarbedLasso.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Whenever you play a Skill this turn, the enemy loses !M! HP.

${ModID}:SpitefulStaff.NAME: Spiteful Staff
${ModID}:SpitefulStaff.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! ${ModID}:Maledict. NL Apply !M! ${ModID}:Venom.

${ModID}:Stalker.NAME: Stalker
${ModID}:Stalker.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If this card is discarded via Scry, play it twice.

${ModID}:Incarcerate.NAME: Incarcerate
${ModID}:Incarcerate.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage X{!M!|>0=+!M!} times. NL ${ModID}:Trigger your next ${ModID}:Trap X times.

${ModID}:HairTrigger.NAME: Hair Trigger
${ModID}:HairTrigger.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Lose !${ModID}:m2! HP. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Draw !M! card{!M!|>1=s}.

${ModID}:BroilingFlames.NAME: Broiling Flames
${ModID}:BroilingFlames.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Add a *Burn into your hand.

${ModID}:Shank.NAME: Shank
${ModID}:Shank.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage. NL Discard !M! card{!M!|>1=s} at random.

${ModID}:JarOfSpiders.NAME: Jar of Spiders
${ModID}:JarOfSpiders.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. If this dealt unblocked damge, the enemy loses !M! HP at the start of their next turn.

${ModID}:BoulderTrap.NAME: Boulder Trap
${ModID}:BoulderTrap.DESCRIPTION: {@@}${ModID}:Trap. NL First !${ModID}:m2! triggers do nothing, then deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.{!Location!|0= NL (Triggered !M! times.)}

${ModID}:SludgeBomb.NAME: Sludge Bomb
${ModID}:SludgeBomb.DESCRIPTION: {@@}${ModID}:Trap. NL Apply Slow to ALL enemies.{!D!|>0= NL ALL enemies lose !D! HP.} NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:NightTerror.NAME: Night Terror
${ModID}:NightTerror.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:NaturesWrath.NAME: Nature's Wrath
${ModID}:NaturesWrath.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies twice. NL Repeat until no enemy has block.

${ModID}:GoForTheThroat.NAME: Go For The Throat
${ModID}:GoForTheThroat.DESCRIPTION: Deal !M! damage X times. NL During Boss and Elite combats, also deal !${ModID}:sd! damage once.

${ModID}:UnstableConcoction.NAME: Unstable Concoction
${ModID}:UnstableConcoction.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain an *Explosive *Potion NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:CorpseFlies.NAME: Corpse Flies
${ModID}:CorpseFlies.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage.{!Upgrades!|>0= NL Put a random Corpse Flies from your draw pile into your hand.} NL If Fatal, {!Upgrades!|0=permanently Upgrade this card|@=add a *Corpse *Flies into your deck}. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:WildMagic.NAME: Wild Magic
${ModID}:WildMagic.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage. NL Scry !M!. NL For each card not discarded, Exhaust it and put an {!Upgrades!|>0= Upgraded} Skill of any color on top of your draw pile.

${ModID}:Hoodwink.NAME: Hoodwink
${ModID}:Hoodwink.DESCRIPTION: {@@}stslib:Snecko. NL Deal !D! damage to a random enemy {!M!|-1=equal to this card's cost + !${ModID}:m2!|@=!M! times}.

${ModID}:DollsCurse.NAME: Doll's Curse
${ModID}:DollsCurse.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL At the end of your turn, lose !${ModID}:m2! HP and gain !M! ${ModID}:Mojo. NL There is no escape from this Curse.
